Interface JRRenderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImageMapRenderable, JRImageMapRenderer, Renderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwtComponentRenderer, BarbecueRenderer, BatikRenderer, DrawChartRenderer, JCommonDrawableRenderer, JRAbstractRenderer, JRAbstractSvgRenderer, JRImageRenderer, JRSimpleImageMapRenderer, JRWrappingSvgRenderer, WrappingDeprecatedRenderable, WrappingImageMapRenderable, WrappingRenderable
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by Renderable.

    public interface JRRenderable
extends java.io.Serializable
